title: The Escape to Cabo
description: Scott Frieze has a pretty comfortable life with no real complaints... a home in the Tucson foothills, Lincoln Mark VIII and a Road King in the garage, even has a fiery little spinner running interference on his life's mundane. Once deciding that the time is now or never to fulfill his childhood fantasy his life unravels and does a complete one eighty. This based on a true story page turning emotion sparker has you tagging along as he finds himself on the legal systems "Devils Doorstep". Experience the courtroom drama, then join Scotty behind the walls of a Maximum Security Prison... the young thugs jungle.Upon release after serving almost 10 years he soon discovers that his sentence has only just begun, someone has slated vengeance and he must continue to pay.His only option... flight.Filled with innuendo, double entendre and smart ass humor. Don't be surprised should you have a strong desire to flip back to page one
author: S.A. LaPoint
